title: Update watermark slider colors to green

requirements.text: Change the opacity slider color to green in the watermark options component
acceptanceCriteria: The opacity slider in the watermark tool displays with green color styling
The green styling is consistent with the site's green theme

requirements.text: Change the font size slider color to green in the watermark options component
acceptanceCriteria: The font size slider in the watermark tool displays with green color styling
The green styling matches the opacity slider styling

requirements.text: Change the rotation slider color to green in the watermark options component
acceptanceCriteria: The rotation slider in the watermark tool displays with green color styling
The green styling is consistent with the other watermark sliders

constraints: Do not modify sliders or styling in other tool components outside the watermark tool
Maintain existing watermark tool functionality while updating only the visual styling of the three specified sliders
nonGoals: Changing colors or styling of other tools
